Name: input_struct
Description: Input structure (pdb). Positional argument

Name: input_md
Description: Input file with MD simulation

Name: output_draw
Description: PDB output filename

Name: out_vol
Description: Volume output filename

Name: NDD_modes
Description: Input vectors for non Delaunay dynamics (NDD)

Name: NDD_frequencies
Description: Input frequencies to calculate the flexibility index by NDD

Name: NDD_scaling
Description: Input scaling factors for NDD

Name: NDD_output
Description: Suffix for the NDD output file

Name: NDD_size
Description: Scaling number for input vectors in non Delaunay dynamics. Default: 1

Name: config_file
Description: Filename of the configuration file

Name: include
Description: Coordinates of the included area in PDB format

Name: tool_check_CH
Description: Filename of output .pdb displaying the included area

Name: tool_pdb_to_ch
Description: Read the input PDB and write 'include.ANA' file with the vertices of its convex hull

Name: tool_pdb_norm
Description: Read the input PDB and renumber its atoms and residues. Write the output PDB to \tool_pdb_norm\

Name: tool_aa_to_ca
Description: Write Calpha atoms indices for the included residues to stdout

Name: ver
Description: Output version number

Name: help
Description: Output help message

Name: included_amino_acids
Description: Amino acids that are part of a cell

Name: included_area_residues
Description: Amino acids that delimit the convex hull of the included area

Name: included_area_atoms
Description: Atoms that delimit the convex hull of the included area

Name: included_area_precision
Description: 0: keep all cells that intercede in the included area.    1: only keep null areas that are within the included area.    Default: 0

Name: sphere
Description: Read the input coordinates and write 'include_sphere.ANA' file with the requested pseudo sphere

Name: cylinder
Description: Read the input coordinates and write 'include_cylinder.ANA' file with the requested pseudo cylinder

Name: prism
Description: Read the input coordinates and write 'include_prism.ANA' file with the requested prism

Name: triangulate_only_included_aas
Description: Instead of triangulating the whole molecule triangulate only the included amino acids.    Default: false

Name: atom_only
Description: Triangulate only ATOM records.    Default: true

Name: clusters_method
Description: none: don't group null areas.    facets: group null areas if the tetrahedrons share facets.    boxes: group null areas if the tetrahedrons bounding boxes intersect.    Default: boxes

Name: clusters_min_size
Description: Minimum number of cells a cluster has to have to be included.    Default: 2

Name: minimum_number_of_vertices_to_include
Description: Minimum number of wall atoms of the included amino acids.    Default: 2

Name: list_wall
Description: atom: output a file with the wall atoms.    residue: output a file with the wall amino acids.     none: don't.    Default: none

Name: separator
Description: Separator character for wall residues (atoms). \+\: might useful for pymol.    Default: \t

Name: ASA_discard_method
Description: none: don't.    cm: determine cells surrondings using the global CM as reference.    backbone: draw a convex hull between the Calphas and discard every cell with its centroid outside(inside) the hull.    axes: determine cells surrondings using its centroid and cartesian axes as references.    Default: cm

Name: ASA_only_side
Description: inside: keep inside nulls.    outside: keep outside nulls.     Default: inside

Name: ASA_exclude_amino_acids
Description: Residues to exclude from the ASA algorithms

Name: ASA_min_dot_pdt
Description: Minimum dot product to keep(discard) cell. As it increases     more cells are classified as being \outside\. Default: 0.7

Name: ASA_max_dist
Description: Maximum distance between cell and Calpha used to keep cell. The bigger this number is the better (but slower) the process gets.    Default: 15

Name: start
Description: Frame to begin reading at.    Default: 1

Name: step
Description: Step count to read trajectory frames. NetCDF format only.    Default: 1

Name: stop
Description: Frame to stop reading. Reads the whole trajectory when set to 0.    Default: 0

Name: NDD_step
Description: 1: ANA will not perform the derivative and instead output 2 files with the volumes of the displaced cavity in the positive and the negative direction.    2: ANA will output the VGV.    3: ANA will output the flexibility index.    Default:

Name: NDD_modes_format
Description: amber: vectors will be read as Amber PCA modes.    row(column): vectors will be read in row(column) major order.    Default: row

Name: NDD_frequences_scaling
Description: If true ANA will scale the input vectors by their frequencies instead of automatically generating its own scaling factors.    Default: false

Name: min_vol_radius
Description: Radius of the sphere with the minimum volume to be taken into account.    Default: 1.4

Name: max_area_radius
Description: Radius of the sphere with the maximum surface to be taken into account.    Default: 99

Name: sphere_count
Description: Sphere count for grid output.    Default: 5

Name: output_type
Description: raw_pdb: null areas as tetrahedrons (residues).    raw_cgo: null areas as tetrahedrons formed with CGO lines in a pymol script.    grid_pdb: null areas filled with points.    grid_cgo: null areas filled with CGO spheres in a pymol script.    Default: grid_pdb
